segments.text: Hello , this is Chen Kun . I am booked on flight LJ88 for Barcelona on Jan . 19th .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on please ... Yes , you are booked already .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now I am afraid I can't get to the airport on that day . I want to change my flight for the 21st.Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry.Flight LJ88 0n that day is full . What about 22 ?
segments.speaker: S2
